actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-84, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 129 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Bill is closed to amendments. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on House Oversight now printed in the resolution shall be considered as adopted.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 27.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 129) providing amounts for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Fifth Congress.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.Res. 129 (committee funding resolution).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 129) providing amounts for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Fifth Congress.
